Title: Requires instruction on work zone safety awareness as part of the pre-licensing course
Summary: Requires instruction on work zone safety awareness as part of the pre-licensing course; establishes curriculum for the work zone safety component.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring instruction on work zone safety awareness as part of the pre-licensing course
